TRB_AfterProject_OutsideSchool-sharedass: Kris, wait!
I know school's boring and all, but slow the hell down!!

Whatever. @@We've got like, a full day to do whatever we want.
Would like to go see Ralsei, but everyone's still inside.
You got any bright ideas on what we can do? ~I'm stumped.
You good, dude?
H-Have any of you spotted where Noelle went?
Uh, no?
Argh, how could I be so careless?!
I borrowed a pencil, and forgot to return it before she left!!
... It's a pencil. ;Knowing her, she probably has hundreds.
Not just ANY pencil! ;It's a treasured heirloom!!
... Okay, maybe not. ;But she did seem quite fond of it!
That's not the only issue, though...
Tell me, Susie, Kris. ;Did you pay attention to our presentation?
If so, surely you both saw how worried Noelle and Ms. Toriel looked!
Oh yeah... @That was sorta weird.
Noelle's, like, the last person I'd expect to ditch class.
Precisely! ;And lately, she's been...@ off.
Distant. ;Staring into space. ;Mumbling to herself...
Initially, I chalked it up to the stress of intense studying...
But now...@ I feel like something's wrong.
Why didn't I ask if she was okay sooner!?
...@ Of course.#;No, her attendance won't be affected.
Okay.# Yes, I understand.@@ ;Hopefully not, no.
... #And excuse my unprofessionalism, but please keep me updated.
... @Thank you.@ ;...@@;Yes, I'll let him know.
She's free to visit the hospital whenever she needs, I assure you.
(Aha! @So that's where she@*
(Shut UP!!@ I'm trying to eavesdrop!!)
(No, seriously!@ She just mentioned the hospital!!)
(Oh.)
(If any of you weren't aware...@ Noelle's father is sick.)
(She told me he's been getting better, although...)
(It wouldn't take a genius to put two and two together.)
(OH.)
We should go check on her, it's the responsible thing to do!
... I mean, I guess, but...
What if, like, she doesn't WANT us there?
It is personal, I agree, Susie dearest...
Even so, as her loyal friends...
... we should strive to at least TRY and check in!!
Yea, makes sense.@ Guess it wouldn't hurt. ~You in, Kris?
... Alright. ;Let's go then.

TRB_Flashback_Bed-sharedassets52.assets-: He sat me down and tried his best to explain everything.
At first, he sugar-coated it all...
I think he just wanted to protect me from the grief he was feeling.
But eventually, he told me everything.
No filters, just the whole horrible truth.
... It helped.@ ;Knowing we were both on the same page now.
That's something Dad does.@ ;And I really appreciate it.
No matter when, or where we are...
He's always there to talk.@ ;Like a sponge, ready to soak up all my troubles.
TRB_Flashback_Home-sharedassets52.assets: One day...@ I heard Dad talking to himself in the dining room.
Curious, I started listening in from the hall.
"How does she expect me to break the news to her?!"
He was muttering under his breath.
"She's just a kid!@ She won't understand..."
He kept going, like he didn't even realize he was saying it all out loud.
"How do I tell her...@ @that her sister's never coming home?"
That's how I found out for the first time.
Not too long after, he heard me crying.
TRB_Flashback_Intermission1-sharedassets: I wish things would go back to how they were before...
TRB_Flashback_School-sharedassets52.asse: ... But not in a neglectful way.
Growing up, Dad let me get a feel for the world on my own...
Whilst cheering me on from the sidelines.
TRB_Flashback_Snow-sharedassets52.assets: I remember when he'd take me on mini adventures.
When Mom was busy, and Dess had to stay after school for detention.
We'd do all sorts together.@ ;Whatever we could come up with.
Although they never lasted too long...
They're still some of my favorite memories to think about.
Of course, eventually I outgrew them...

So how are things...@ with your father?
Do you have that pencil I lent you earlier?

You good? @@;You're sorta...@ shaking, and stuff.
And what's with that face?# Did something happen or what?
Surely she's... @writing her father a "get well soon" card?

I really need someone... @@to talk to right now.
TRB_Hospital_NoelleVent-sharedassets52.a: They said his condition worsened suddenly last night.
And...@ has been slowly declining ever since...
He's too weak to even speak to anybody now!
... I can't help but think about the worst outcome...
N-Noelle...@ I understand why you're worried, but...
You cannot jump to conclusions just yet!!
The doctors are trained for this, there's still so much they can do!!
Trust me, I'm confident your father's getting the best care possible!
... Yeah, uh, what he said.
Your dad's tough, right?
Bet he's just...@ taking a power nap, or something.
... I dunno.@ I suck at this stuff...
It's okay, really.
I think I just needed to hear someone say that.
Everything just feels so heavy lately.@ Like the world's pressing on me.
You see, that's what friends are for! ~We lift each other up!
Even if our arms feel like they're about to fall off!!
Speak for yourself. ;Sounds to me like you're just weak.
... Oh, uh. @Sorry, I'm messing up your whole heartfelt thing, huh?
You're both ridiculous, but thank you...
Honestly, just talking with you all has really calmed my nerves.
I know I've been freaking out, but...@ you all really do help.
I...@ don't know what I'd do without you.
Anytime, Noelle!@ We're your supporting heroes!
... Right?
Yeah, yeah, we got your back.
Just don't expect me to be all soft and mushy all the time, got it?
(You assure Noelle that you're always open to chat.)
Thank you...@ everyone. ;I really appreciate it.

Not for long, however.@ ;He'll need to be back in urgent care shortly.

Perfect! ;While you're in there, mention we helped!

Not that I'd ever fight back, of course. ~I'm the bigger bird.
I-I'll be back...@ in a minute.

Go on, he's waiting for ya!!
